title: Ethereum Cat Herder Meeting #51
body:
## Date and Time

Feb 02, 2021, at 15:00 UTC

## Location 

Zoom: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/87350675396?pwd=SEpiQ0ZHQ1NHL0RlQnNXVVNtRjAvZz09

Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A

## Agenda

### 1.  [ECH contribution to contents at Ethereum.org](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/48#issuecomment-767968085)
- [EIP resource moved to ethereum.org](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ethereum-cat-herders.github.io/blob/master/index.md#eip-resources)
- [Funding GitHub bot actions](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/48#issuecomment-768371134) 

### 2.   [Progress on ECH website](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/155)

### 3. Ethereum network upgrade [survey](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/11MJU9tBYb5Z44EpjAIX8hNJ8zG9a960jWKTVLE-7Z_0/edit)

### 4. Events & community meetings
- [Eth Denver](https://www.ethdenver.com/)
- Ethereum Stakeholderâ€™s Community call 

### 5. [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) 
- [All Core Dev meeting #104](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/242/commits/21c66c68b030dd2f5631f2d7423cf7836ef953af)
- [Eth2 Implementers' meeting #56](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-pm/blob/7709c6fc711cc3ab0a6054c46a1298bb8c22b992/eth2.0-implementers-calls/call_056.md)
- [EIP Improvement Process meeting #25](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/blob/2992436d35ec5fa781da134422fffa4355120344/All%20EIPIP%20Meetings/Meeting%20025.md)

### 6. [Peep an EIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F) 
- [ EIP-1822: Universal Upgradeable Proxy Standard with Gabriel B. & Patrick G.](https://youtu.be/aNBbj_R5M_g)
- Upcoming: EIP-3076: Validator client interchange format (slashing protection) with Michael Sproul, Sacha Saint-Leger, Danny Ryan on Feb 03, 2021 at 4:00 pm EST 

### 7. Discuss and close the ECH GitHub Issues/PRs
- [ethereum-cat-herders/PM](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues)
- [ethereum-cat-herders/funding](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/funding/issues)

### 8. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- [Meeting 50](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/blob/master/All%20Ethereum%20Cat%20Herder%20Meetings/Meeting%2050.md)

#### The date for the next meeting - Feb 16, 2021
